verses.verse: Likewise <WH2063> this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the trespass <WH817> offering: it is most <WH6944> holy. <WH6944>

In the place <WH4725> where <WH834> they kill <WH7819> the burnt <WH5930> offering shall they kill <WH7819> the trespass <WH817> offering: and the blood <WH1818> thereof shall he sprinkle <WH2236> round <WH5439> about on the altar. <WH4196>
And he shall offer <WH7126> of it all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> thereof; the rump, <WH451> and the fat <WH2459> that covers <WH3680> the inwards, <WH7130>

And the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that is on <WH5921> them, which <WH834> is by the flanks, <WH3689> and the lobe <WH3508> that is above <WH5921> the liver, <WH3516> with the kidneys, <WH3629> it shall he take <WH5493> away:
And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> them on the altar <WH4196> for an offering made by fire to the LORD: <WH3068> it is a trespass <WH817> offering.
Every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among the priests <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> thereof: it shall be eaten <WH398> in the holy <WH6918> place: <WH4725> it is most <WH6944> holy. <WH6944>
As the sin <WH2403> offering is, so is the trespass <WH817> offering: there is one <WH259> law <WH8451> for them: the priest <WH3548> that makes atonement <WH3722> therewith shall have <WH1961> it.

And the priest <WH3548> that offers <WH7126> any man's <WH376> burnt <WH5930> offering, even the priest <WH3548> shall have <WH1961> to himself the skin <WH5785> of the burnt <WH5930> offering which <WH834> he has offered. <WH7126>

And all <WH3605> the meat offering <WH4503> that is baked <WH644> in the oven, <WH8574> and all <WH3605> that is dressed <WH6213> in the frying pan, <WH4802> and in the pan, <WH4227> shall be the priest's <WH3548> that offers <WH7126> it.

And every <WH3605> meat offering, <WH4503> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and dry, <WH2720> shall all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> have, <WH1961> one <WH376> as much as another. <WH251>
And this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings, which <WH834> he shall offer <WH7126> to the LORD. <WH3068>

If <WH518> he offer <WH7126> it for a thanksgiving, <WH8426> then he shall offer <WH7126> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> with oil, <WH8081> and cakes <WH2471> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> of fine flour, <WH5560> fried. <WH7246>

Besides <WH5921> the cakes, <WH2471> he shall offer <WH7126> for his offering <WH7133> leavened <WH2557> bread <WH3899> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> of his peace <WH8002> offerings.

And of it he shall offer <WH7126> one <WH259> out of the whole <WH3605> oblation <WH7133> for an heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> to the LORD, <WH3068> and it shall be the priest's <WH3548> that sprinkles <WH2236> the blood <WH1818> of the peace <WH8002> offerings.

And the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace <WH8002> offerings for thanksgiving <WH8426> shall be eaten <WH398> the same day <WH3119> that it is offered; <WH7133> he shall not leave <WH5117> any of it until <WH5704> the morning. <WH1242>

But if <WH518> the sacrifice <WH2077> of his offering <WH7133> be a vow, <WH5088> or <WH176> a voluntary <WH5071> offering, it shall be eaten <WH398> the same day <WH3119> that he offers <WH7126> his sacrifice: <WH2077> and on the morrow <WH4283> also the remainder <WH3498> of it shall be eaten: <WH398>
But the remainder <WH3498> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3119> shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>

And if <WH518> any of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace <WH8002> offerings be eaten <WH398> at all on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3119> it shall not be accepted, <WH7521> neither <WH3808> shall it be imputed <WH2803> to him that offers <WH7126> it: it shall be an abomination, <WH6292> and the soul <WH5315> that eats <WH398> of it shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>

And the flesh <WH1320> that touches <WH5060> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2931> thing shall not be eaten; <WH398> it shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire: <WH784> and as for the flesh, <WH1320> all <WH3605> that be clean <WH2889> shall eat <WH398> thereof.

But the soul <WH5315> that eats <WH398> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings, that pertain to the LORD, <WH3068> having his uncleanness <WH2932> on him, even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from his people. <WH5971>

Moreover the soul <WH5315> that shall touch <WH5060> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2932> thing, as the uncleanness <WH2932> of man, <WH120> or <WH176> any unclean <WH2931> beast, <WH929> or <WH176> any <WH3605> abominable <WH8263> unclean <WH2931> thing, and eat <WH398> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings, which <WH834> pertain to the LORD, <WH3068> even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from his people. <WH5971>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> You shall eat <WH398> no <WH3808> manner of fat, <WH2459> of ox, <WH7794> or of sheep, <WH3775> or of goat. <WH5795>

And the fat <WH2459> of the beast <WH5038> that dies <WH5038> of itself, and the fat <WH2459> of that which is torn <WH2966> with beasts, <WH2966> may be used <WH6213> in any <WH3605> other use: <WH4399> but you shall in no <WH3808> wise eat <WH398> of it.

For whoever <WH3605> eats <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of the beast, <WH929> of which <WH834> men offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD, <WH3068> even the soul <WH5315> that eats <WH398> it shall be cut <WH3772> off from his people. <WH5971>
Moreover you shall eat <WH398> no <WH3808> manner of blood, <WH1818> whether it be of fowl <WH5775> or of beast, <WH929> in any <WH3605> of your dwellings. <WH4186>
Whatever <WH3605> soul <WH5315> it be that eats <WH398> any <WH3605> manner of blood, <WH1818> even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from his people. <WH5971>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> He that offers <WH7126> the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace <WH8002> offerings to the LORD <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> his oblation <WH7133> to the LORD <WH3068> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace <WH8002> offerings.

His own hands <WH3027> shall bring <WH935> the offerings of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire, the fat <WH2459> with the breast, <WH2373> it shall he bring, <WH935> that the breast <WH2373> may be waved <WH5130> for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>
And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> the fat <WH2459> on the altar: <WH4196> but the breast <WH2373> shall be Aaron's <WH175> and his sons'. <WH1121>
And the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> shall you give <WH5414> to the priest <WH3548> for an heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> of the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace <WH8002> offerings.

He among the sons <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> that offers <WH7126> the blood <WH1818> of the peace <WH8002> offerings, and the fat, <WH2459> shall have <WH1961> the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> for his part. <WH4490>

For the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and the heave <WH8641> shoulder <WH7785> have I taken <WH3947> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from off the sacrifices <WH2077> of their peace <WH8002> offerings, and have given <WH5414> them to Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> and to his sons <WH1121> by a statute <WH2706> for ever <WH5769> from among the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

This <WH2063> is the portion of the anointing <WH4888> of Aaron, <WH175> and of the anointing <WH4888> of his sons, <WH1121> out of the offerings of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire, in the day <WH3119> when he presented <WH7126> them to minister to the LORD <WH3068> in the priest's <WH3547> office;

Which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to be given <WH5414> them of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> in the day <WH3119> that he anointed <WH4886> them, by a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout their generations. <WH1755>

This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH4503> of the meat offering, and of the sin <WH2403> offering, and of the trespass <WH817> offering, and of the consecrations, <WH4394> and of the sacrifice <WH2077> of the peace <WH8002> offerings;

Which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> in the day <WH3119> that he commanded <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to offer <WH7126> their oblations <WH7133> to the LORD, <WH3068> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>
